overview:
An extremely outgoing personable and connector individual, that knows enough to know what he knows and what he needs to learn. As a friend and/or colleague, he is someone that you can count upon and know you will get.

He is a seasoned executive with several years both internally and externally implementing strategic initiatives through maximizing organizational productivity and performance. He has and continually works in all aspects of business operations, influencing and maximizing results, from the trenches to the boardroom, in order to understand the inner workings of business and bring that simplistic perspective to clients.

Ellner founded the company to create and to leverage business operations and combine them with real time online technology by providing organizations with the tools and expertise needed to revolutionize overall business performance. The company’s products/services provide clients’ with a simplistic one-page snapshot of their organization. CNC Strategy’s methodology improved business performance by cultivating corporate cultures, vision, strategies and activities that build increased productivity and the best ROI. His internal and external experiences, education, has provided him the ability to understand an organization from the inside out and vice versa.
